threepio.helper
Class RegexHelper

java.lang.Object
  threepio.helper.RegexHelper
Direct Known Subclasses:
TagExtractor
public class RegexHelper
extends java.lang.Object

RegexHelper has methods that expand upon the default Regular Expressions functionality in Java. Essnetially, RegExHelper adds methods to the Matcher class, which cannot be extended.

Author:
jhoule

Method Detail

extractAll

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> extractAll(java.lang.String regex,
                                                               java.lang.String body)
extracts all substrings of the main string that match the pattern.

Parameters:
regex - - the pattern the substrings are to match.
body - - the string to gather the substrings from.
Returns:
a list of all matching substrings of the main string

extractAll

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> extractAll(java.util.regex.Matcher m,
                                                               java.lang.String body)
extracts all substrings of the main string that match according to m.

Parameters:
m - - the matcher the substrings are to match.
body - - the string to gather the substrings from.
Returns:
a list of all matching substrings of the main string

changeAll

public static java.lang.String changeAll(java.util.regex.Matcher m,
                                         java.lang.String body,
                                         java.lang.String replacement,
                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
Changeall changes all instances that match to the replacement text (place holder). It compiles a list of the snippets it removed, in order.

Parameters:
m - - a matcher to match the snippets against.
body - - the string to change.
replacement - - the string to put in place.
list - - the list to dump matching snippets into.
Returns:
the list of snippets replaced. Side effect is new string placed in result.
